summary.span: 命名空間提供預先以 DTD 或 XML 資料流填入快取的支援。

span.span: The namespace provides support for prepopulating the cache with DTDs or XML streams.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 命名空間會定義而列舉型別。The namespace defines the and the enumeration. 做為解析程式，自動呼叫網路不需要或不可行時。 is used as a resolver when automatic calls to the network are not desired or are not possible. 比方說，這種類型可用來載入快取的外部 Dtd。For example, this type can be used for loading cached external DTDs. 另一個案例是載入 XHTML 和使用預先載入以 XHTML 1.0 定義的已知 Dtd。Another scenario is loading XHTML and using to preload well-known DTDs that are defined in XHTML 1.0. 預先載入的已知 DTD 不會叫用任何網路連線因為這些 Dtd 已內嵌 System.Xml.Utils 組件。Preloading a well-known DTD does not invoke any network connections because these DTDs are already embedded in the System.Xml.Utils assembly. 目前，包含 XHTML 1.0 和 RSS 0.91 Dtd。Currently, includes XHTML 1.0 and RSS 0.91 DTDs. 列舉會定義哪些已知的 Dtd辨識。The enumeration defines which well-known DTDs the recognizes. 列舉型別包含`Xhtml10`， `Rss091`， `All`，和`None`值。The enumeration contains the `Xhtml10`, `Rss091`, `All`, and `None` values. `XmlKnownDtd.Xhtml10` 指定`T:System.Xml.Resolvers.XmlPreloadedResolver`會辨識 Dtd 和 XHTML 1.0 中所定義的實體。`XmlKnownDtd.Xhtml10` specifies that the `T:System.Xml.Resolvers.XmlPreloadedResolver` will recognize DTDs and entities that are defined in XHTML 1.0. 如需 XHTML 的詳細資訊，請參閱[XHTML 1.0 規格](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=109812)。For more information about XHTML, see the [XHTML 1.0 specification](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=109812). `XmlKnownDtd.Rss091` 指定`T:System.Xml.Resolvers.XmlPreloadedResolver`會辨識 Dtd 和實體以 RSS 0.91 定義。`XmlKnownDtd.Rss091` specifies that the `T:System.Xml.Resolvers.XmlPreloadedResolver` will recognize DTDs and entities that are defined in RSS 0.91. `XmlKnownDtd.All` 指定會辨識所有目前支援的 Dtd。`XmlKnownDtd.All` specifies that the will recognize all currently supported DTDs. 這是預設行為。This is the default behavior. `XmlKnownDtd.None` 指定不會辨識任何預先定義的 Dtd。`XmlKnownDtd.None` specifies that the will not recognize any of the predefined DTDs. > [!NOTE] > 當預先載入的已知 DTD 中，它不會呼叫網路連線，因為已經 System.Xml.Utils 組件中內嵌 Dtd。When the preloads a well-known DTD, it does not invoke network connections because the DTDs are already embedded in the System.Xml.Utils assembly.
